summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1293, for the improvement of 2nd Avenue, from Pine Street to Denny Way; and Stewart Street, Virginia Street, Lenora Street, Blanchard Street, Bell Street, Battery Street, Wall Street, Vine Street, Clay Street and Broad Street, each from 1st Avenue to 2nd Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 14107 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
